metadata.title: CVE-2022-1381 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: global heap buffer overflow in skip_range in GitHub repository vim/vimprior to 8.2.4763. This vulnerability is capable of crashing software,Bypass Protection Mechanism, Modify Memory, and possible remote execution

criterions.comment: vim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
